Project

Students will extend and deepen their knowledge of an aspect of a business-related subject area appropriate to their award. They will apply a range of secondary research skills covered in the Research Methods subject.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Develop knowledge of, analyse and critically assess the literature in a given business-related subject area.

+  In conjunction with a supervisor, formulate research questions or objectives in the given subject area.

+  Construct an argument employing relevant, valid evidence in support of a conclusion that directly addresses the problem posed by the research question(s) or objective(s).

+  Demonstrate competence in independent learning.

+  Demonstrate competence in the communication skills needed to generate the required format of written presentation.
